hero.title: WHO WE ARE
hero.description: Naga Balm began in 2013, born by the observation that while the traditional Preng Kola ointment is widely used, there was no petroleum-free, natural alternative available.

story.title: The solution?
description: People deserved a choice—one that combined the wisdom of tradition with modern, cleaner ingredients.

A coconut oil-based Preng Kola that stayed as natural as possible, without compromising on effectiveness. The symbol of the Naga was chosen to honor its deep historical significance—legend tells of Naga skin being used in a magical elixir for healing.
This nod to ancient wisdom reflects our mission to provide trusted, effective pain relief in a modern, safe way.

today.title: Today
description: Relaunched in August 2023, Naga Balm continues to be handcrafted by Coco Khmer Co., Ltd.

Operating out of a purpose-built cosmetics-grade manufacturing facility in Chak Angre Krom, we pride ourselves on being a boutique manufacturer—small but ambitious, with a steadfast commitment to elevating the standards of topical pain relief.

We still do everything mostly by hand —from mixing the formulation to pouring and labeling. While we appreciate the efficiency of machines, we value people more, believing that the human touch is an essential part of what makes Naga Balm special.
